text: Bury St Edmunds railway station is a station in Suffolk, England for Bury St Edmunds. Trains are currently run by Greater Anglia. ==Trains== The following services currently call at Bury St Edmunds: Operator Route Material Frequency Abellio Greater Anglia Peterborough - Whittlesea - March - Manea - Ely - Bury St Edmunds - Stowmarket - Ipswich Class 170 Every 2 hours Abellio Greater Anglia Cambridge - Dullingham - Newmarket - Kennett - Bury St Edmunds - Thurston - Elmswell - Stowmarket - Needham Market - Ipswich Class 170 1 per hour == References== ==Other websites== * Bury St Edmunds station on navigable 1946 O.S. map Category:Railway stations in Suffolk Category:1847 establishments in Europe Category:1840s establishments in England
title: Bury St Edmunds railway station
